Title: Verify that user should be able to log in with valid credentials and is redirected to the correct dashboard page

Steps.4: Enter a valid username into the Username field
Steps.5: Enter a valid password into the Password field
Steps.7: Verify that the URL changes to the dashboard page
Steps.8: Check if the user's name or profile picture is displayed on the dashboard, confirming that the correct user account is logged in

Expected result: User has been successfully logged into their account
